meanings.definition: The place where a dead body is buried.
meanings.sent1: We visited the gravesite of our beloved pet.
meanings.sent2: The family gathered at the gravesite to pay their respects.
meanings.sent3: The gravesite was so peaceful, even the birds seemed to mourn.
meanings.sent4: Her memories were buried deep within her, like a gravesite of emotions.
meanings.sent5: The gravestone at the gravesite stood tall, a silent guardian of the past.

meanings.definition: A location where a deceased person is interred.
meanings.sent1: The gravesite was adorned with fresh flowers.
meanings.sent2: Visitors often leave tokens of remembrance at the gravesite.
meanings.sent3: Even in death, the deceased found solace at their gravesite.
meanings.sent4: The gravesite held the stories of generations past, etched in stone.
meanings.sent5: The moonlight cast a haunting glow over the gravesite, as if whispering secrets of the departed.
